      Methods in coreservlets that return types with arguments of type Course

      static java.util.ArrayList<Course> courseDAO.getAllCourses()
      getAllCourses returns all courses in the Database.

      getCourse returns an ArrayList of courses the user specifies
      Methods in coreservlets with parameters of type Course
